src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: I le Aso Gafua, Sara Danius, o le failautusi tumau o le Komiti Aoao mo Galuega Tusitusia i le a’oga a Suetena, sa fa’alauiloa fa’alaua’itele ai e le komiti i le fa’asologa o le polokalame leitio, i le Leitio Sveriges i Suetena, e le mafai ona oo atu tuusa’o ia Bob Dylan e uiga i le manumalōina o le fa’ailoga Aoao i Galuega Tusitusia i le 2016, sa lafoa’i taumafaiga ina ia maua atu o ia.
hyp_text: O le mālōlelei, Sara Danius, le faigatai fa'asalalau o le Komiti o le Fa'asalalau a le Nobel i le Fa'asalalau o le Matitai, na fa'ausi'i i le vaega o le radio i Sveriges Radio i Sivili, e fa'ausi'i le komiti, e fa'ausi'i i Bob Dylan lelei e fa'ata'ita'i i le 2016 o le Fa'asalalau a le Nobel i le Fa'asalalau o le Matitai, e fa'ausi'i lelei e fa'ata'ita'i i lelei.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Sa ia auai foi i le faia o mamanu (engraving) o tupe pepa i le tele o atunuu, o fa’ata’ita’iga lata mai o lana galuega e aofia ai ata o le Palemia i luma o le $5 ma le $100 o tupe pepa fou a Kanata.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

hyp_text: E leai i le fa'asalalau a le taimi uma a le fa'asalalau i le galuega o le Pasifika-Atalantiki i le To'ona'i. Na fa'atatau i le Amerika e fa'ata'ita'i le tasi ma le fa'ausi i le moana o le Pasifika i le fa'ata'ita'i a le Peretini.
